[Files]
    existing_access_base_path = /mnt/OzFlux/Sites/
    new_access_base_path = /rdsi/market/access_regftp/download/
    site_master_file_path = /mnt/OzFlux/site_master.xls
    from_file = False
[Variables]
    [[AH]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            standard_name = mass_concentration_of_water_vapor_in_air
            long_name = Absolute humidity
            units = g/m^3
            statistic_type = average
    [[Fa]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Available energy
            units = W/m^2
            statistic_type = average
    [[Fe]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = lat_hflx
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Latent heat flux
            standard_name = surface_upward_latent_heat_flux
            statistic_type = average
            units = W/m^2
    [[Fg]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            standard_name = downward_heat_flux_in_soil
            long_name = Ground heat flux
            units = W/m^2
            statistic_type = average
    [[Fh]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = sens_hflx
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Sensible heat flux
            standard_name = surface_upward_sensible_heat_flux
            statistic_type = average
            units = W/m^2
    [[Fld]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = av_lwsfcdown
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Down-welling longwave radiation
            standard_name = surface_downwelling_longwave_flux_in_air
            statistic_type = average
            units = W/m^2
    [[Flu]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            standard_name = surface_upwelling_longwave_flux_in_air
            long_name = Up-welling shortwave radiation
            units = W/m^2
            statistic_type = average
    [[Fn]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            standard_name = surface_net_downwawrd_radiative_flux
            long_name = Net radiation
            units = W/m^2
            statistic_type = average
    [[Fnlw]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = av_netlwsfc
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Net longwave radiation
            statistic_type = average
            units = W/m^2
    [[Fnsw]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = av_netswsfc
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Net shortwave radiation
            statistic_type = average
            units = W/m^2
    [[Fsd]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = av_swsfcdown
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Down-welling shortwave radiation
            standard_name = surface_downwelling_shortwave_flux_in_air
            statistic_type = average
            units = W/m^2
    [[Fsu]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            standard_name = surface_upwelling_shortwave_flux_in_air
            long_name = Up-welling shortwave radiation
            units = W/m^2
            statistic_type = average
    [[Habl]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = abl_ht
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Atmospheric boundary layer height
            units = m
            statistic_type = average
    [[Precip]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = accum_prcp
        [[[Attr]]]
            standard_name = rainfall_amount
            long_name = Rainfall
            units = mm
            statistic_type = sum
    [[ps]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = sfc_pres
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Surface air pressure
            standard_name = surface_air_pressure
            statistic_type = average
            units = kPa
    [[RH]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = rh2m
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Relative humidity
            standard_name = relative_humidity
            statistic_type = average
            units = percent
    [[SH]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = qsair_scrn
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Specific humidity
            standard_name = specific_humidity
            statistic_type = average
            units = kg/kg
    [[Sws]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = soil_mois
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Soil water content
            standard_name = soil_moisture_content
            statistic_type = average
            units = m^3/m^3
    [[Ta]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = temp_scrn
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Air temperature
            standard_name = air_temperature
            statistic_type = average
            units = degC
    [[Ts]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = soil_temp
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Soil temperature
            standard_name = soil_temperature
            statistic_type = average
            units = degC
    [[U]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = u10
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Wind component, positive eastward
            standard_name = eastward_wind
            statistic_type = average
            units = m/s
    [[V]]
        [[[nc]]]
            name = v10
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Wind component, positive northward
            standard_name = northward_wind
            statistic_type = average
            units = m/s
    [[Wd]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Wind direction
            standard_name = wind_from_direction
            statistic_type = average
            units = degrees
    [[Ws]]
        [[[Attr]]]
            long_name = Wind speed
            standard_name = wind_speed
            statistic_type = average
            units = m/s
